attribs.name: npc_senses
attribs.current: Blindsigth 10 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 13

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-Lx74Xe24-4mCt2QXAxZ_desc
attribs.current: On each of its turns, the drow can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-Lx74d-a9PFkqSPkf3Zq_desc
attribs.current: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being proned, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-Lx74hdpt51ZhkJZ0Vnr_desc
attribs.current: The drow deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll , or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the drow that isn't incapacitated and the drow doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-Lx74sGxfIDVQM3dZjEX_desc
attribs.current:
The drow's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 11). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: Dancing lights, Spider Climb.
1 f day each: Darkness, Faerie fire, Slow, Sleep, Misty Step.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-Lx750QqZYH3WVXQed8m_desc
attribs.current: The Drow ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-Lx75BZKcg8ocp2HBRhr_desc
attribs.current: While in sunlight, the drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom(Perception) checks that rely on sight.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-Lx75ZzKhoVWBEXuIwTX_description
attribs.current: The drow makcs three shortsword attacks.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-Lx7JZMgiOZlGDJtMrjO_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: A bit of phosphorus or wychwood, or a glowworm

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-Lx7JZMgiOZlGDJtMrjO_spelldescription
attribs.current: You create up to four torch-sized lights within range, making them appear as torches, lanterns, or glowing orbs that hover in the air for the duration. You can also combine the four lights into one glowing vaguely humanoid form of Medium size. Whichever form you choose, each light sheds dim light in a 10-foot radius.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-Lx7NdBfnybehK5LuAn9_spelldescription
attribs.current:
One creature or object of your choice that you can see within range rises vertically, up to 20 feet, and remains suspended there for the duration. The spell can levitate a target that weighs up to 500 pounds. An unwilling creature that succeeds on a Constitution saving throw is unaffected.
The target can move only by pushing or pulling against a fixed object or surface within reach (such as a wall or a ceiling), which allows it to move as if it were climbing. You can change the target’s altitude by up to 20 feet in either direction on your turn. If you are the target, you can move up or down as part of your move. Otherwise, you can use your action to move the target, which must remain within the spell’s range.
When the spell ends, the target floats gently to the ground if it is still aloft.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-Lx7NdBfnybehK5LuAn9_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: Either a small leather loop or a piece of golden wire bent into a cup shape with a long shank on one end

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-Lx7NdBfnybehK5LuAn9_spelltarget
attribs.current: One creature or object of your choice that you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-Lx7OEYZmUK-4lk-PScF_spelldescription
attribs.current:
Each object in a 20-foot cube within range is outlined in blue, green, or violet light (your choice). Any creature in the area when the spell is cast is also outlined in light if it fails a Dexterity saving throw. For the duration, objects and affected creatures shed dim light in a 10-foot radius.
Any attack roll against an affected creature or object has advantage if the attacker can see it, and the affected creature or object can’t benefit from being invisible.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-Lx7OEYZmUK-4lk-PScF_spelltarget
attribs.current: Each object in a 20-foot cube within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-Lx7OsMPiZyakktMEAmL_spelltarget
attribs.current: A point you choose within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-Lx7OsMPiZyakktMEAmL_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: Bat fur and a drop of pitch or piece of coal

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-Lx7OsMPiZyakktMEAmL_spelldescription
attribs.current:
Magical darkness spreads from a point you choose within range to fill a 15-foot-radius sphere for the duration. The darkness spreads around corners. A creature with darkvision can’t see through this darkness, and nonmagical light can’t illuminate it.
If the point you choose is on an object you are holding or one that isn’t being worn or carried, the darkness emanates from the object and moves with it. Completely covering the source of the darkness with an opaque object, such as a bowl or a helm, blocks the darkness.
If any of this spell’s area overlaps with an area of light created by a spell of 2nd level or lower, the spell that created the light is dispelled.

attribs.name: npc_resistances
attribs.current: Piercing and Slashing from not magical weapons

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LzSqXKi0xBM6JNjQ2Hn_description
attribs.current:
the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or
be poisoned for | hour. If the saving throw fails by 7 or less,
the target is also unconscious while poisoncd in this way. The
targct wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes
an action to shake it awake.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LzSqoF0-sDx2PG9z0xl_spelldescription
attribs.current: Until the spell ends, one willing creature you touch gains the ability to move up, down, and across vertical surfaces and upside down along ceilings, while leaving its hands free. The target also gains a climbing speed equal to its walking speed.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LzSqoF0-sDx2PG9z0xl_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: A drop of bitumen and a spider

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LzSrUq22D1tfyh2ptFp_spelltarget
attribs.current: Up to six creatures of your choice in a 40-foot cube within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LzSrUq22D1tfyh2ptFp_spelldescription
attribs.current: You alter time around up to six creatures of your choice in a 40-foot cube within range. Each target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be affected by this spell for the duration. An affected target’s speed is halved, it takes a −2 penalty to AC and Dexterity saving throws, and it can’t use reactions. On its turn, it can use either an action or a bonus action, not both. Regardless of the creature’s abilities or magic items, it can’t make more than one melee or ranged attack during its turn. If the creature attempts to cast a spell with a casting time of 1 action, roll a d20. On an 11 or higher, the spell doesn’t take effect until the creature’s next turn, and the creature must use its action on that turn to complete the spell. If it can’t, the spell is wasted. A creature affected by this spell makes another Wisdom saving throw at the end of its turn. On a successful save, the effect ends for it.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LzSrYTGhEr56wCZ-50w_spelltarget
attribs.current: Creatures within 20 feet of a point you choose within range (in ascending order of their current hit points, ignoring unconscious creatures)

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LzSrYTGhEr56wCZ-50w_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: A pinch of fine sand, rose petals, or a cricket

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LzSrYTGhEr56wCZ-50w_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, roll an additional 2d8 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LzSrYTGhEr56wCZ-50w_spelldescription
attribs.current: This spell sends creatures into a magical slumber. Roll 5d8; the total is how many hit points of creatures this spell can affect. Creatures within 20 feet of a point you choose within range are affected in ascending order of their current hit points (ignoring unconscious creatures). Starting with the creature that has the lowest current hit points, each creature affected by this spell falls unconscious until the spell ends, the sleeper takes damage, or someone uses an action to shake or slap the sleeper awake. Subtract each creature’s hit points from the total before moving on to the creature with the next lowest hit points. A creature’s hit points must be equal to or less than the remaining total for that creature to be affected. Undead and creatures immune to being charmed aren’t affected by this spell.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LzSrbJ6cn9LbkPJc8OW_spelldescription
attribs.current: Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that you can see.
